channel.title: Use Ledger Live on multiple devices – ledgerrlivess.org
channel.description: Unlock the full Ledger experience by pairing the **Ledger Live** app with a Ledger hardware wallet. Our wallets are independently certified and designed to resist sophisticated cyber attacks. You can also use the **Ledger Live app** on your smartphone; however, we will use a Windows computer for this guide.
